content.prompt: You will be coding a function that will take in an input of a percentage and will output the letter grade and the GPA equivalent.In this learning activity, you will be tested on your knowledge of if-else statements and how to implement it. You will be modifying 2 variables: double gpa (which houses your gpa equivalent in decimal form), and String letter (which houses your letter grade equivalent in String form)Note: Make sure you do not have any spaces in your String letter variable and that your double variable always only holds 2 digits or less after the decimal point.Below is the chart for the range of each letter grade/GPA: Assume your input will always be an int value and within the range [0, 100]     A+  |    4.0     |     97% ≤ percentage ≤ 100%     A    |    4.0     |     93% ≤ percentage < 97%     A-   |   3.75   |     90% ≤ percentage < 93%     B+  |   3.25   |     87% ≤ percentage < 90%     B    |    3.0    |     83% ≤ percentage < 87%     B-   |  2.75    |     80% ≤ percentage < 83%     C+  |  2.25    |     77% ≤ percentage < 80%     C    |   2.0     |     73% ≤ percentage < 77%     C-   |  1.75    |     70% ≤ percentage < 73%     D+  |  1.25    |     67% ≤ percentage < 70%     D    |   1.0     |     63% ≤ percentage < 67%     D-   |  0.75    |     60% ≤ percentage < 63%     F     |   0.0     |     0% ≤ percentage < 60%Note: YOU DO NOT HAVE TO HAVE A SYSTEM.OUT.PRINTLN IN YOUR CODE. AS LONG AS YOU MODIFY THE 2 VARIABLES GIVEN, YOU WILL SUCCEED.Examples of input/output:E.g. Enter percentage received in class: 96 | Output in console: "Letter Grade Received: A : GPA Received: 4.0"E.g. Enter percentage received in class: 88 | Output in console: "Letter Grade Received: B+ : GPA Received: 3.25"E.g. Enter percentage received in class: 85 | Output in console: "Letter Grade Received: B : GPA Received: 3.0"E.g. Enter percentage received in class: 60 | Output in console: "Letter Grade Received: D- : GPA Received: 0.75"E.g. Enter percentage received in class: 59 | Output in console: "Letter Grade Received: F : GPA Received: 0.0"
